lead_paragraph: PLAYERS Greg Ryan, the coach of the United States women’s national team, completed his roster for the World Cup in China with the additions of midfielder Angela Hucles, striker Natasha Kai and defender Marian Dalmy.
snippet: PLAYERS Greg Ryan, the coach of the United States women’s national team, completed his roster for the World Cup in China with the additions of midfielder Angela Hucles, striker Natasha Kai and defender Marian Dalmy.
